5.speaker: PENGUIN
5.japanese: と　とりあえず何か頼む
5.english: A-Anyway, do you guys want to order something?

6.speaker: PENKO1
6.japanese: ちゃんと選んでちょうだい

9.speaker: PENGUIN
9.japanese: じゃあ　ケーキセットの人
9.english: All right, who wants the cake set?

10.speaker: PENKO1
10.japanese: メニューじゃないわよ
10.english: We're not talking about the menu! We're saying that you need to choose one of us!

16.speaker: POLAR BEAR
16.japanese: 魂がどこかへ旅立ってるね
16.english: I think his soul has wandered off somewhere.

17.speaker: LLAMA
17.japanese: 辛いですよね　ペンギンさん
17.english: It must be hard for him. Each of them have their own unique features.

18.speaker: PANDA
18.japanese: ラマさん　ペン子さんたちの 見分けついてるの
18.english: You can tell the Penkos apart, Mr. Llama?

22.speaker: LLAMA
22.japanese: スラッとしてるのが　ペン子さん
22.english: The slim one is Miss Penko.

23.speaker: LLAMA
23.japanese: ちょっと羽に クセがあるのがペン美さん
23.english: The one with a unusually shaped beak is Miss Penmi.

24.speaker: LLAMA
24.japanese: ペン奈さんは　少しボーイッシュで

25.speaker: LLAMA
25.japanese: ペン花さんは　少しコケティッシュ

26.speaker: LLAMA
26.japanese: 和風美人なのが　ペン乃さん
26.english: Miss Penno is a Japanese beauty.

27.speaker: LLAMA
27.japanese: いちばん色気があるのは ペンニュエルさんだし

28.speaker: LLAMA
28.japanese: ペンジョリーナさんは いちばんわかりやすいですね
28.english: and Miss Penjolina is the easiest to differentiate.

29.speaker: LLAMA
29.japanese: くちばしが ふっくらしてますから

30.speaker: SASAKO
30.japanese: 私にはみんな 同じに見えます
30.english: They all look exactly the same to me.

32.speaker: POLAR BEAR
32.japanese: あのリボンは 目印にならないんだっけ
32.english: I thought those ribbons were supposed to help with telling them apart.

33.speaker: SASAKO
33.japanese: ときどき 取り替えっこしてるみたいです
33.english: It appears that they're trading them every now and then.

37.speaker: PENGUIN
37.english: Y-Yes... You're able to tell us apart now, right?

39.speaker: PENKO
39.japanese: そう　だったら私が 誰だか言ってみて
39.english: I see. In that case, who am I? Huh?

47.speaker: PENKO
47.japanese: 間違えたら許さないわよ
47.english: If you make a mistake, you'll be sorry.

48.speaker: LLAMA
48.japanese: 放っておいて大丈夫ですかね
48.english: I wonder if we should be leaving them alone. Huh?

49.speaker: LLAMA
49.japanese: コウテイペンギンの女の子は
49.english: I hear that female emperor penguins

50.speaker: LLAMA
50.japanese: 男の子の取り合いで激しい争いをするそうですよ
50.english: brutally fight over male emperor penguins.

51.speaker: SASAKO
51.japanese: ケンカはまずいですよ
51.english: A fight would not be good.

52.speaker: LLAMA
52.japanese: 笹子さん　このメモをペンギンさんに
52.english: Miss Sasako, please give this memo to Mr. Penguin.

54.speaker: PENKO?
54.japanese: さあ　私が誰だか言ってみて
54.english: Now say which one I am.

56.speaker: SASAKO
56.japanese: すみません　そろそろ オーダーよろしいでしょうか
56.english: Pardon the interruption, but are you ready to order?

57.speaker: PENKO?
57.japanese: あら　ごめんなさい

58.speaker: PENKO?
58.english: I wonder what I should get?

59.speaker: PENKO?
59.japanese: 私　パフェ食べたいんだけど
59.english: I want to get a parfait.

60.japanese: ペンギンさん　これを

62.speaker: SASAKO
62.japanese: では　ご注文 うけたまわりました

63.speaker: SASAKO
63.english: It will be out shortly. Okay.

66.speaker: PENKO
66.japanese: さあ　私が誰か言ってみて
66.english: Now say which one I am.

67.speaker: PENGUIN
67.japanese: キミは　ペン子さんだね

68.speaker: PENKO
68.japanese: えっ　えぇ　そうよ

69.speaker: PENGUIN
69.japanese: そして　キミが　ペン美さん
69.english: And you're Miss Penmi! Huh? Yes, I am!

70.speaker: PENGUIN
70.japanese: キミは　ペン乃さん

72.speaker: PENGUIN
72.japanese: あなたが　ペン奈さん

74.speaker: PENGUIN
74.japanese: そして　ペン花さん

76.speaker: PENGUIN
76.japanese: そして　キミが　ペンニュエルさん

79.speaker: PENGUIN
79.japanese: え～っと…　あれ ペンニュエルさんは…

80.speaker: PENGUIN
80.japanese: 赤がペン子さんで　白がペン花さん
80.english: Red is Miss Penko, white is Miss Penka.

81.speaker: PENGUIN
81.japanese: ペン美さんは　水色で…

82.speaker: PEN?
82.english: Let's try this one more time...

84.speaker: SASAKO
84.japanese: あげくに シャッフルされちゃいましたよ
84.english: In the end they did a shuffle.

85.speaker: LLAMA
85.english: There's nothing more that can be done.

86.speaker: PANDA
86.japanese: もう　めんどくさいからラマさんと つきあっちゃえばいいのに
86.english: This is too troublesome. They should just go out with you, Mr. Llama.

87.speaker: LLAMA
87.japanese: 静かに　ペンギンさんが動きます
87.english: Quiet. Mr. Penguin is making his move.

88.speaker: PENGUIN
88.japanese: 名前が なんだというのだろうか…

90.speaker: PENGUIN
90.japanese: 僕は　キミたちの名前を 好きになったわけじゃない
90.english: I didn't fall in love with your names! I love you all for who you are, just the way you are!

91.speaker: LLAMA
91.japanese: 追い詰められすぎて 力技に出ましたね
91.english: He's cornered, so he's going with a power move.

92.speaker: POLAR BEAR
92.japanese: うまく　逃げ切れるといいね
92.english: Hopefully he'll be able to escape.

93.speaker: PENGUIN
93.japanese: そう　誰が誰かを 今　僕が言ったからと言って
93.english: That's right! What point is there in me saying

94.japanese: なんの意味があるんでしょう

95.speaker: PENGUIN
95.japanese: ありません ありませんよ
95.english: There's none. There's no point at all!

96.speaker: PENGUIN
96.japanese: 花が美しいのは 名前のせいじゃない
96.english: Your feathers are not beautiful because of your name!

97.speaker: PENGUIN
97.japanese: 存在そのものが美しいのです
97.english: Existence itself is what is beautiful! Yes, just like all of you.

99.speaker: PENGUIN
99.japanese: だから　どうか そんな些細なことは気にせず
99.english: So please, don't concern yourself with such trivial matters.

100.speaker: PENGUIN
100.japanese: もっと愛を感じてほしい

107.speaker: LLAMA
107.japanese: そんなに　甘くないですよね
107.english: That would have been too easy.

108.speaker: POLAR BEAR
108.japanese: このままだと　やっぱり…

109.speaker: PENGUIN
109.japanese: あぁっ…ぺんみ　ぺんこ　あぁ～っペンにゅ
109.english: Ow, ow, ow, Pe-Penm— Ow, Penk— Ow, Pennu—

111.speaker: SASAKO
111.japanese: 変な誇張　しないでください
111.english: Please stop with the weird exaggerations.

112.speaker: POLAR BEAR
112.japanese: じゃあ　笹子さん　止めてきて
112.english: All right, Miss Sasako. Please go stop them. Huh?

114.speaker: SASAKO
114.japanese: シロクマさん　お願いします

115.speaker: POLAR BEAR
115.japanese: おばあちゃんの遺言で

116.speaker: POLAR BEAR
116.japanese: 今は　カウンターから出ちゃダメって 言われてるんだ
116.english: I can't come out from behind the counter right now.

117.speaker: SASAKO
117.japanese: ウソが　雑すぎます

118.speaker: POLAR BEAR
118.japanese: ラマさん　行かない
118.english: How about you go, Mr. Llama?

119.speaker: LLAMA
119.japanese: もう　パンダくんが行きましたよ

121.speaker: PANDA
121.japanese: あの～　ちょっといいですか
121.english: Excuse me, could I have a moment?

122.speaker: PENKOS
122.english: What?! P-Panda, you don't need to be here! Go away!

123.speaker: PANDA
123.japanese: ペンギンさんのどこが好きなの
123.english: What do you like about Mr. Penguin?

125.speaker: PANDA
125.japanese: 僕イマイチペンギンさんのよさって わからないから興味津々
125.english: I still don't know what's so good about Mr. Penguin, so I'm really interested.

126.speaker: PEN?
126.japanese: それは　楽しい遊園地に 連れていってくれたり…
126.english: Well, he took me to a fun amusement park.

127.speaker: PEN?
127.japanese: スリル満点ね　ペンギンさん
127.english: This is so exciting, isn't it, Mr. Penguin?! Huh?

128.speaker: PEN?
128.japanese: えっと～ カラオケに連れて行ってくれたり
128.english: Let's see... Well, he took me to karaoke.

129.speaker: PENGUIN
129.japanese: ９０年代シリーズ　火がついちゃった
129.english: I'm on fire with songs from the 90's!

131.japanese: 誰も僕を止められないよ
131.english: Ain't no one gonna stop me!

132.speaker: PENGUIN
132.japanese: では聞いてください エイベックス　９０年代編
132.english: All right, here we go. The Avex 90's songs...

133.speaker: PEN?
133.japanese: ほらほら～　すてきなディナーに 連れて行ってくれたり
133.english: Huh? Well, you know. He took me out to a wonderful dinner. One more bottle! Let's get another bottle over here! Huh?

135.speaker: PENGUIN
135.japanese: 順番に会うのは大変だから
135.english: It'll be hard to meet with you separately... So from now on, let's all meet together. All together! Okay?

136.speaker: PENKO
136.japanese: あれ　なんで好きなのかしら
136.english: Huh? Why do I like him?

138.speaker: PEN?
138.japanese: よくよく考えたら なんで好きなのかしらね
138.english: The more I think about it, why do we even like him?

139.speaker: PENGUIN
139.japanese: そ…　そりゃあ いいところがあったからでしょ
139.english: Th-That's because there was something good about me, right?

143.speaker: SASAKO
143.japanese: そっとしておいてあげましょうか
143.english: We should probably let him be.

146.speaker: PENGUIN
146.japanese: 僕って いいとこ一つもないのかな
146.english: Is there not a single good thing about me?

147.speaker: LLAMA
147.japanese: え…　そっちを 気にしてたんですか
147.english: Oh, you were worried about that?

148.speaker: POLAR BEAR
148.japanese: なんにも無いのが ペンギンさんのいいところだよ
148.english: I think not having any is what's good about you, Mr. Penguin.

149.speaker: PENGUIN
149.english: There has to be at least one.

150.speaker: PENGUIN
150.japanese: いや　たくさんあるでしょ
150.english: No, there have to be lots!

151.speaker: POLAR BEAR
151.japanese: まあまあ　修羅場が 終わってよかったじゃない
151.english: Now, now. At least your dilemma is over with.

152.speaker: PANDA
152.english: Cheers! Thanks for all your hard work.

154.speaker: LLAMA
154.japanese: さぁ　ペンギンさんを 胴上げしましょう
154.english: All right. Let's toss Mr. Penguin up in the air.

155.speaker: PANDA
155.japanese: せ～の　ワッショイ　ワッショイ…

156.speaker: PENGUIN
156.english: There has to be something— Heave ho, heave ho.

157.speaker: PENGUIN
157.japanese: ちょ　ちょ　話をそらさないで

158.speaker: PENGUIN
158.english: Too high! Apparently Yama Arashi is really hot right now.

160.speaker: SASAKO
160.japanese: 今　人気のアイドルグループですよ

161.speaker: SASAKO
161.japanese: ヤマアラシの５人組で　女の子にすごく 人気があるそうですよ
161.english: It's a group of five porcupines and they're super popular with girls.

162.speaker: PANDA
162.japanese: うちのお母さんも ハマっちゃっててさ
162.english: My mom is hooked on them, too.

163.speaker: PANDA
163.japanese: いつのまにヤマアラシが好きになる呪いをかけられたんだろう
163.english: I wonder when she was cursed into liking porcupines.

164.speaker: PENGUIN
164.japanese: 純粋に好きなだけでしょ
164.english: I think she just genuinely likes them.

166.speaker: PANDA MAMA
166.japanese: 帰ってくるなりなんなの
166.english: You just got home. What's the matter?

167.speaker: PANDA
167.japanese: たまの休みくらいゴロゴロさせてよ
167.english: Let me laze around for the little time I have off.

168.speaker: MAMA
168.japanese: 週２日しかバイトしてないじゃない
168.english: You only work twice a week.

169.speaker: MAMA
169.japanese: 休みのほうが多いでしょ
169.english: You have more days off than days you work.

170.speaker: PANDA
170.japanese: パンダがゴロゴロしたっていいじゃない
170.english: Pandas are allowed to laze around.

171.speaker: MAMA
171.english: You're in the way of my cleaning.

172.speaker: MAMA
172.japanese: あなたも 自分の部屋を片づけなさい
172.english: And you should be cleaning your room.

173.speaker: PANDA
173.japanese: 片づけちゃうと お母さんの仕事なくなるから
173.english: Well if I clean it, you'll have less to do, so I'll leave it for you. Don't suck me up! I wonder if he's so lazy because I spoiled him.

174.speaker: MAMA
174.japanese: 一度　家から 追い出してみたらどうかしら
174.english: Maybe I should kick him out of the house once.

175.speaker: MAMA
175.english: Go live on your own. What?!

176.speaker: MAMA
176.japanese: でも あの子のことだからきっと…

177.speaker: MAMA
177.japanese: 野良パンダになっても ぐうたらしてるわ
177.english: Even as a stray panda, he'd laze around.

178.speaker: MAMA
178.japanese: とんがってるヤマアラシさんとは 大違いね
178.english: Completely different from the sharp members of Yama Arashi.

179.speaker: MAMA
179.japanese: あら　キングペンギンさん

180.speaker: KING
180.japanese: いよいよ　明日よね

182.speaker: BOTH
182.japanese: ヤマアラシのコンサート

183.speaker: KING
183.japanese: 今回はね　バックに カピバラキッズがつくんですって
183.english: I heard that the Capybara Kids are going to be the backup dancers this time!

184.speaker: MAMA
184.japanese: カピバラ　知らないわ
184.english: Capybara? I haven't heard of them.

185.speaker: KING
185.japanese: 癒やし系でとってもラブリーなの

186.speaker: MAMA
186.japanese: わかった　ちょっと調べてみるわ
186.english: All right. I'll look them up.

187.speaker: MAMA
187.japanese: それじゃ　明日駅に集合ね
187.english: Well then, I'll meet you at the station tomorrow.

189.speaker: MAMA
189.japanese: え～っと　これかしら
189.english: Let's see... I wonder if this is it.

191.speaker: MAMA
191.japanese: なんて　鼻の下が長くて出っ歯で… ブサイクちゃんなの
191.english: Look how long his upper lip is. Not to mention he's buck-toothed and not very cute.

192.speaker: MAMA
192.japanese: こんな　ずんぐりしてても アイドルになれるの
192.english: Something so short and stout can become an idol?

193.speaker: MAMA
193.japanese: だったら　うちの息子だって アイドルになれたんじゃない
193.english: Then my son could have become an idol, too!

194.speaker: MAMA
194.japanese: そしたら　今頃…　ヤマアラシのバックで踊ってたりして
194.english: And then he could have been a backup dancer for Yama Arashi by now...

196.speaker: MAMA
196.japanese: メンバーとも　お知り合いに…
196.english: And he would know the members...

199.speaker: MAMA
199.japanese: ヤマアラシさんと お近づきになれるチャンスが…
199.english: My chance to get close to Yama Arashi...

200.speaker: MAMA
200.japanese: やっぱり育て方　間違ったわ～
200.english: I {/i1}was{/i0} wrong in how I raised him!

202.speaker: MAMA
202.japanese: あ　今日ね お母さん　遅くなるから
202.english: Oh, by the way, I'll be home late tonight.

203.speaker: MAMA
203.japanese: 夕食に　タケノコの煮込み 用意しといたから
203.english: I made some bamboo shoot stew for dinner,

204.speaker: MAMA
204.english: so just warm it in the microwave.

207.speaker: MAMA
207.japanese: ヤマアラシのコンサートよ

212.speaker: MAMA
212.japanese: 今からでも 遅くないと思うのよね　アイドルになるの
212.english: I don't think it's too late for you to become an idol.

213.speaker: PANDA
213.japanese: 僕…　もう　動物園じゃアイドルだよ
213.english: But I'm already an idol at the zoo.

214.speaker: MAMA
214.japanese: あなた　ゴロゴロしてるだけじゃない
214.english: But all you do is laze around.

215.speaker: MAMA
215.japanese: 歌って踊れないと　アイドルは
215.english: Idols have to be able to dance and sing! But me lazing around is what everyone likes.

216.speaker: MAMA
216.japanese: キングペンギンさん　お待たせ
216.english: Sorry to keep you waiting, Ms. King Penguin.

217.speaker: KING
217.japanese: あらっ　パンダママ

218.speaker: KING
218.japanese: おしゃれしてきたわね

220.speaker: MAMA
220.japanese: 今日は念入りに ブラッシングしてきたのよ
220.english: I made sure my brushing was thorough today.

222.speaker: KING
222.japanese: 昨日は興奮して 眠れなかったわ
222.english: I was so excited last night that I couldn't sleep!

225.speaker: KING
225.japanese: これ　全部ドームに行く人よ…
225.english: All of these people are headed to the Dome.

227.speaker: KING
227.japanese: まずは　グッズ買いましょう
227.english: Let's go buy merchandise first! Let's!

228.speaker: MAMA
228.japanese: まあ～ 会場限定グッズがたくさん

229.speaker: KING
229.japanese: ポスターと　ツアーパンフは外せないわね
229.english: A poster and tour book is a must.

230.speaker: MAMA
230.japanese: あとは　うちわとペンライトと…
230.english: Not to mention a fan and a pen light...

231.speaker: MAMA
231.japanese: あ～　でも… クリアファイルとＴシャツも欲しい…
231.english: Oh, but I want a clear file folder and T-shirt, too.

232.speaker: MAMA
232.japanese: え～い　もう　全部買っちゃえ
232.english: Oh, whatever! I'm going to buy it all!

233.speaker: MAMA
233.japanese: 大人買いよ　あ　バッグもつけて～
233.english: I'll have the lot! Oh, throw a bag in, too!

234.speaker: MAMA
234.english: I can't believe I spent so much...

235.speaker: KING
235.english: It's for a good cause! It had to be done.

236.speaker: MAMA
236.japanese: そうよね ファンなら　これくらい当然よね
236.english: You're right. This is a must if you're a true fan.

238.speaker: KING
238.japanese: 最初はカナダヤマアラシくんとタテガミヤマ アラシくんの区別もついてなかったのにね～
238.english: You originally couldn't even tell the difference between Canadian Porcupine and Crested Porcupine.

241.speaker: MAMA
241.japanese: ドームは　何度来ても広いわね～
241.english: I'm amazed at how huge the Dome is each time I come here.

242.speaker: KING
242.japanese: 今のうちに 腹ごしらえしなくちゃ
242.english: I better eat now, while I have the chance.

243.speaker: MAMA
243.japanese: 私は応援の準備しましょ
243.english: I'm going to get ready to cheer.

244.speaker: MAMA
244.japanese: 今回のツアーのペンライト なかなか　すてきね
244.english: The pen light on this tour is delightful.

245.speaker: KING
245.japanese: これ　光り方も変えられるのよ
245.english: You can even change how it lights up.

247.speaker: KING
247.japanese: アップテンポの曲には 早く点滅する　フラッシュ
247.english: You can set it to flash to go along with the up-tempo songs,

248.speaker: KING
248.japanese: スローバラードには ゆっくり点滅する　ウェーブ
248.english: and then set it to wave for the slow ballads.

250.speaker: KING
250.japanese: 盛り上がってきたわね～

251.speaker: MAMA
251.japanese: お嬢さんたち もう　テンション高いわ～
251.english: All the girls are so excited!

252.speaker: KING
252.japanese: 若い子みたいな　パワーはないけど
252.english: We may not have the energy of these girls,

253.speaker: KING
253.japanese: 頑張って応援しましょ
253.english: but let's do our best to cheer them on, too!

258.japanese: 意外とかわいいじゃない
258.english: They're cuter than I thought they'd be.

260.speaker: ARASHI
260.japanese: 連れてくよ　キミを夜の　サバンナへ
260.english: We're going to take you To the night-time savanna P-Panda Mama! Here comes their solos! We are nocturnal, tonight!

261.speaker: ARASHI
261.japanese: 驚いた？背中のトゲは　ダテじゃない

263.speaker: ARASHI
263.english: The spikes on our backs Aren't just for show

265.speaker: ARASHI
265.english: We're going to stir up a storm

269.speaker: ARASHI
269.japanese: 小さくたって　無敵

272.speaker: ARASHI
272.japanese: 足で　ドラム　トゲを打ち鳴らせ
272.english: Drum with our feet Hit with our spines Oh, my gosh! Crested totally looked right at me!

273.speaker: ARASHI
273.japanese: ライオンだって逃げ出して

274.speaker: MAMA
274.japanese: {\an8}私も見つめられちゃったわ～
274.english: He totally looked at me, too!

275.speaker: ARASHI
275.japanese: そう　僕たちは　ヤマアラシ
275.english: That's right, we are Yama A-ra-shi

277.speaker: MAMA
277.japanese: みんなのペンライトが　きれい
277.english: Everyone's pen lights look so pretty.

278.speaker: MAMA
278.japanese: この一体感がいいのよね～
278.english: This sense of togetherness is so amazing.

279.speaker: CRESTED
279.japanese: みんな 今日は　一日　ありがとう

280.speaker: CANADA
280.japanese: きっと　また会えるよね
280.english: We'll see each other again soon!

282.speaker: MAMA
282.english: We'll come again! They were all so cool.

283.speaker: MAMA
283.japanese: ますます　ファンになっちゃった
283.english: I've become an even bigger fan!

284.speaker: KING
284.japanese: 家事とか育児とか 日常を忘れられる　ひとときね
284.english: You get to forget about house work and kids just for a moment.

286.speaker: MAMA
286.japanese: ヤマアラシさん 青春気分を　ありがとう
286.english: Thank you for making me feel young again, Yama Arashi. My mom went to a concert yesterday.

289.speaker: POLAR BEAR
289.japanese: 僕たちも アイドルグループ結成しようか
289.english: How about we start an idol group, too?

291.speaker: POLAR BEAR
291.japanese: 笹子さんは　マネージャーね
291.english: You can be our manager, Miss Sasako.

292.speaker: SASAKO
292.japanese: みんな　ありがとう

293.speaker: PENGUIN
293.japanese: なんで　マネージャーが いちばん目立ってるの
293.english: Why's the manager outshining everyone else?

294.speaker: PANDA
294.japanese: ペンギンさん　ペンギンさん

295.speaker: PENGUIN
295.english: What is it, Panda? How long do you want to be unemployed, Mr. Penguin?

296.speaker: PENGUIN
296.japanese: いたくないかな　基本無職では
296.english: I don't think I want to be unemployed in general.

297.speaker: PANDA
297.japanese: ペンギンさんって変わってるよね

298.speaker: PENGUIN
298.japanese: 変わってるのは君じゃないかな
298.english: I think you're the one that's strange.

299.speaker: PANDA
299.japanese: じゃ何でいたい？　かめむし？
299.english: Then what do you want to be? A stink bug?

301.speaker: POLAR BEAR
301.japanese: もうちょっと続けよう

303.speaker: POLAR BEAR
303.japanese: 来週の白熊カフェーは

304.speaker: POLAR BEAR
304.japanese: 何処かで何かをお送りします

305.speaker: PENGUIN
305.japanese: 曖昧すぎるよそのお知らせ
